Max Clifford , the well-known public relations guru who reportedly received a lucrative settlement when his phones were tapped, said that Edmonson's firing and Andy Coulson 's resignation was like a volcano that is starting to erupt. The Miami Herald is pleased to provide this opportunity to share information, experiences and observations about what's in the news. LONDON( AFP)- British Prime Minister David Cameron began looking for a new media chief Saturday to replace Andy Coulson after he quit over a tabloid phone-hacking row, in a test for the nine-month-old government. So far, our worst day in government, a senior David Cameron aide told The Guardian after Andy Coulson quit Friday, bowing to pressure over what he knew about hacking at the News of the World( NOTW) when he was its editor. veteran who had served as CEO of Novell and chief technology officer of Sun Microsystems, Eric Schmidt was brought in to provide some`` adult supervision.'' On his Twitter account on Thursday, Eric Schmidt wrote: Day-to-day adult supervision is no longer needed. `` I believe Larry is ready'' to take over as CEO, Eric Schmidt said during a call with analysts.`` It's time for him to have a shot at running this.''
